articles.description: The Foo Fighters have announced who will be their new drummer in the wake of the tragic passing of Taylor Hawkins. Fans have made it clear they are extremely happy with the choice.
articles.content:
The Foo Fighters had a literal motley crew of cameos in their livestream, "Foo Fighters: Preparing Music for Concerts," before announcing a new addition to the band: drummer Josh Freese.
In the wake… [+3255 chars]
